item.title: How to limit request frequency in Java
item.description: Certainly we want to limit the frequency of user visits, because users could get angry, and angry people will click on our app like crazy. They could also be very bad and use some crawler to try to bring down our server. So how to do that? In this article, we use springboot and log the user’s information and access frequency into redis, you can also store it into memory or database.
